name: Get HIPAA Risk Assessment Information
description: Collects HIPAA assessment details and completes the corresponding task

steps.name: Compliance Record Description Update
steps.description: Updates Compliance Record with "In Progress" Status & Created Task List

step_variables.demoMode: {% if vars.result[0].dataCompliances[0].testMode %}Test Mode ON{% endif %}

steps.name: Risk Assessment Details Update in Compliance Record
steps.description: Update HIPAA risk assessment details in the compliance record.

message.content: Necessary information for the PHI Breach Risk Assessment has been collected.

resource.isMediaNoticeRequired: {% if vars.input.params.noOfAffectedUsers >= 500 %}{{"YesNoInput" | picklist("Yes", "@id")}}{% else %}{{"YesNoInput" | picklist("No", "@id")}}{% endif %}

inputVariables.name: typeOfDataBreach
inputVariables.label: Type of Data Breach
inputVariables.title: Dynamic List
inputVariables.tooltip: •Hacking- Technical Intrusion e.g malware or hacking •Improper Disposal- Improper disposal of electronic media or paper •Loss- Loss of electronic media or paper •Theft- Theft of electronic media or paper

inputVariables.name: locationOfBreach
inputVariables.label: Location of Breach
inputVariables.title: Multiselect Picklist
inputVariables.tooltip: Select the breach location from the provided options.

inputVariables.name: describeOtherLocationOfBreach
inputVariables.label: Describe Other Location of Breach
inputVariables.tooltip: Describe the breach location not listed in the options.

inputVariables.name: typeOfPHIExposedInBreach
inputVariables.label: Type of PHI Exposed in Breach
inputVariables.title: Multiselect Picklist
inputVariables.tooltip: • Clinical - Treatment Information • Demographic - Identifier Information • Financial - Financial Information

inputVariables.name: clinicalPHIExposedInBreach
inputVariables.label: Clinical PHI Exposed in Breach
inputVariables.title: Multiselect Picklist
inputVariables.tooltip: Clinical Information refers to an individual's treatment details.

inputVariables.name: demographicPHIExposedInBreach
inputVariables.label: Demographic PHI Exposed in Breach
inputVariables.title: Multiselect Picklist
inputVariables.tooltip: Demographic Information refers to an individual's identification details.

inputVariables.name: financialPHIExposedInBreach
inputVariables.label: Financial PHI Exposed in Breach
inputVariables.title: Multiselect Picklist
inputVariables.tooltip: Financial Information refers to an individual's financial details.

inputVariables.name: typeOfPHIExposedInBreachOther
inputVariables.label: Type of PHI Exposed in Breach (Other)
inputVariables.title: Text Area
inputVariables.tooltip: Describe the specific protected health information involved in the breach that is not listed in the provided options.

inputVariables.name: noOfAffectedUsers
inputVariables.label: No. of Affected Users
inputVariables.title: Decimal Field
inputVariables.tooltip: The approximate number of individuals affected by the breach

inputVariables.name: safeguardsInPlaceBeforeBreach
inputVariables.label: Safeguards in Place Before Breach
inputVariables.title: Multiselect Picklist
inputVariables.tooltip: - Privacy Rule (Training, Policies and Procedures) - Security Rule Administrative (Risk Analysis, Risk Management) - Security Rule Physical (Facility Access Controls, Workstation Security) - Security Rule Technical (Access Controls, Transmission Security)

inputVariables.name: actionsTakenInResponseToBreach
inputVariables.label: Actions Taken in Response to Breach
inputVariables.title: Multiselect Picklist
inputVariables.tooltip: Choose actions taken in response to the breach from the provided list.

inputVariables.name: describeOtherActionsTaken
inputVariables.label: Describe Other Actions Taken
inputVariables.title: Text Area
inputVariables.tooltip: Describe any other actions taken that are not listed.

routes.name: Get Compliance Record ID -> Get Parent Incident ID
Get Parent Incident ID -> Update HIPAA Assessment Data
Update GDPR Assessment Data -> Update Task Status
Update Task Status -> Update Compliance Record Description
